farm: Isle of Man Offshore Wind Farm
content: On 11/11/2014 DONG Energy were announced as the preferred partner of the Isle of Man wind farm.

farm: Isle of Man Offshore Wind Farm
content: The Isle of Man Government is interested in leasing the seabed in its territorial waters to an offshore wind developer. It is estimated that this could generate £5M per year for the Government.

farm: Isle of Man Offshore Wind Farm
content: WFW advised DONG Energy on their successful tender. It was led by WFW's Head of Planning & Project Development.

farm: Isle of Man Offshore Wind Farm
content: To assist with the process for tendering for future offshore wind farms and tidal energy schemes in Isle of Man territorial seas.

farm: Isle of Man Offshore Wind Farm
content: HiDef will perform aerial survey of the wind farm site. The work will take place for a period of 2 years.
